heading: HB07977
0: AN ACT REQUIRING THE PHILIPPINE CHARITY SWEEPSTAKES OFFICE (PCSO) TO PRINT THE LOTTO TICKETS ON A NON-THERMAL PAPER OR ANY KIND OF RECYCLABLE PAPER WHICH ENSURES THAT THE PRINTINGS THEREON CANNOT BE EASILY ERASED OR OBSCURED BY SIMPLE SCRATCHES AND CRUMPLES, AND CAN WITHSTAND REASONABLE HEAT, THEREBY REDUCING THE POSSIBILITY OF TICKET SPOILAGE
principal-authors: NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C.; MACEDA, EDWARD VERA PEREZ; MARTINEZ, ERIC M.; SANDOVAL, FEDERICO "RICKY" II S.; MALAPITAN, DALE "ALONG" R.;

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07977
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING THE PHILIPPINE CHARITY SWEEPSTAKES OFFICE (PCSO) TO PRINT THE LOTTO TICKETS ON A NON-THERMAL PAPER OR ANY KIND OF RECYCLABLE PAPER WHICH ENSURES THAT THE PRINTINGS THEREON CANNOT BE EASILY ERASED OR OBSCURED BY SIMPLE SCRATCHES AND CRUMPLES, AND CAN WITHSTAND REASONABLE HEAT, THEREBY REDUCING THE POSSIBILITY OF TICKET SPOILAGE
ABSTRACT : Aims to prevent the failure of claimants to get their prize because their ticket printout became pale to yield validation by changing the paper type.
ALIAS NAME : “ The PCSO Lottery Paper Act of 2016.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C., MACEDA, EDWARD VERA PEREZ, MARTINEZ, ERIC M., SANDOVAL, FEDERICO "RICKY" II S., MALAPITAN, DALE "ALONG" R.
